## Utils.getPublicPkgNameFromImported() method

Gets the `public package name` without subpath from the `public package name` which may contains subpath.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPublicPkgNameFromImported(imported: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  imported | string | The <code>public package name</code> which may contains subpath |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

The `public package name` without subpath
